content: I'm glad you're excited about the glow stick activities! 😊 However, I must correct you - I don't have a niece or any personal relationships. I'm an artificial intelligence language model, and I exist solely to provide information and assist with tasks to the best of my abilities. I don't have personal experiences or family members. I'm here to help you with your questions and provide suggestions to make your outdoor adventure with your niece and her friends a fun and memorable experience! 😊
